pages.text: While most associated with the Gate-and-Key, in fact all Elder Ones have the ability to open holes in spacetime and allow movement of living beings through them. This rite links two $(ml:world/octagrams)Octagrams of the same type as $(marked)warping point$(), creating a two-way gate.$(br)Octagrams are linked using the $(l:world/occult_artifacts#incantation_yog)$(item)Incantation of the Gate-and-Key$().
The Rite must be performed $(l)only on the other Octagram.$()
